message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $150 is too high for me. I'm really interested in the product but my budget is $80.  Would you be willing to come down to that?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I really need to make a profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $90. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $100, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $100 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really pushing my limits here, but I'm willing to go up to $95. If you're not willing to come down to that, I'm going to have to seriously consider John's offer.

I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $100, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money on this deal. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
